abstract:
Well well well...another fun and informative vlog...thanks for that!!!
I'll be visiting in Sept and will definitely schedule a bike tour FIRST THING per your suggestion.

For me, Paris is a city that the more I visit, the more I learn and the more I don't know and must return! Paris is like crack...it's addictive! 

Full disclosure- I've never done crack.😳

Jay did you know that the old original Wallace fountains differ from the copies they have made since?  Hard to distinguish if you don't know what to look for.  I can tell you if you like.
Great vlog BTW.
Thanks Jay. We are going to try the bike about tour at Versailles.  Hopefully you can guide it. Lol.  Have you ever thought about a video about a trip to the museum d Orsay?
